scripts.compile: echo Compiling... && yarn workspace @xylabs/ts-scripts-yarn3 run compile && xy compile
scripts.compile:cjs: echo Compiling CJS... && yarn workspaces foreach -ptA run compile:package:cjs
scripts.compile:esm: echo Compiling ESM... && yarn workspaces foreach -ptA run compile:package:esm
scripts.deploy-major: yarn workspaces foreach --all version major --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-minor: yarn workspaces foreach --all version minor --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-patch: yarn workspaces foreach --all version patch --deferred && yarn deploy-common
scripts.deploy-common: yarn build && yarn version apply --all && yarn workspaces foreach -ptv npm publish
scripts.deploy-next: yarn workspaces foreach --all version minor --deferred && yarn build && yarn version apply --all --prerelease && yarn workspaces foreach -ptv npm publish --tag next
